title: mc联机侠开服进不来、控制台指令不明或不完整？
author: 皇帝陛下.
txt_content:
...

[19:14:46] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown or incomplete command, see below for error
[19:14:46] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[19:14:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown or incomplete command, see below for error
[19:14:56] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[19:15:06] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown or incomplete command, see below for error
[19:15:06] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[19:15:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown or incomplete command, see below for error
[19:15:16] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[19:15:27] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown or incomplete command, see below for error
[19:15:27] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[19:15:37] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown or incomplete command, see below for error
[19:15:37] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[19:15:47] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown or incomplete command, see below for error
[19:15:47] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[19:15:57] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown or incomplete command, see below for error
[19:15:57] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
...
以上仅截取的一段，控制台不停地弹出这句话，而且非正版玩家有时候无法解析主机名，目前只有我（腐竹）能进，游戏版本1.16，纯净版无mod，

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
建议用樱花映射：https://natfrp.com
教程（不是我的）https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1SK4y1r7GS

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
从你截取的日志来看是每10秒执行一次空指令？
检查你的联机侠服务端配置、插件配置等
如果可以请附上log

无法解析主机名的话，把DNS改成114.114.114.114，具体怎么改请百度，这是玩家网络的DNS解析服务器被污染的问题

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
这种软件问题很多的。。
可以看这个帖子自己开服
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-831469-1-1.html
